name: We Have No Time To Say Goodbye
name_original: We Have No Time To Say Goodbye
description:
#Follow the words in front of you and feel the power of emotion.

#Use WASD to move the character and use shift to be faster.

#This is a narrative puzzle game of my assignment in Goldsmiths UOL, this story`s background set in 2095, the character is a robot, it is a story about emotional awakening.

#Character model made by myself, and scene models comes from resources. Non-profit, practice only.

#More details about this game: https://suziechen93.medium.com/test-e46bd27a28bc
